sys_script.name: Populate IP Address City

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_fcba4a7c477331108a5bfe02d16d4325
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1257294_iplookup_ipaddressinfo</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Populate IP Address City</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    try {
        var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('x_1257294_iplookup.IPInfo', 'GetIPInfo');
        r.setStringParameterNoEscape('specific_field', 'geo');
        r.setStringParameterNoEscape('ipaddress', 'current.ip_address');

        //override authentication profile 
        //authentication type ='basic'/ 'oauth2'
        //r.setAuthenticationProfile(authentication type, profile name);

        //set a MID server name if one wants to run the message on MID
        //r.setMIDServer('MY_MID_SERVER');

        //if the message is configured to communicate through ECC queue, either
        //by setting a MID server or calling executeAsync, one needs to set skip_sensor
        //to true. Otherwise, one may get an intermittent error that the response body is null
        //r.setEccParameter('skip_sensor', true);

        var response = r.execute();
        var responseBody = response.getBody();
        var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();
        var responseObj = JSON.parse(responseBody);
		current.city = responseObj.city;
        gs.info("City = " + current.city);
        current.update();
    } catch (ex) {
		gs.info("uncaught error = ", + ex);
        var message = ex.message;
    }

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-15 12:17:07</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>fcba4a7c477331108a5bfe02d16d4325</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Populate IP Address City</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="IPLookup" source="x_1257294_iplookup">82ffb8e0473331108a5bfe02d16d436c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="IPLookup">82ffb8e0473331108a5bfe02d16d436c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_fcba4a7c477331108a5bfe02d16d4325</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-15 13:17:51</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async_always</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=fcba4a7c477331108a5bfe02d16d4325"/></record_update>
